price: (Muusaanis) ni jedhe: “Beellamni keessan guyyaa ayyaanaati; namoonnis waaree walitti qabamuudha”
arabic: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla mawʿidukum yawmu al-zīnati wa-an yuḥ'shara al-nāsu ḍuḥan
